title: What The Board Needs To Know
description: Everything from the week beginning May 1st, 2023 that a corporate board director needs to know ahead of a board meeting. This week, we focus on how cyber attacks logistics companies can create issues both for the company itself as well as its customers and ask whether management has considered resilience in this area. We also cover why compliance-first approaches might miss critical cyber risk information, the privacy and security risks of ChatGPT and the need for visibility of devices on a network.
